subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy tightened his grip on the Vuelta a España title, finishing second behind his rival Ezequiel Mosquera in the race’s 20th stage, a mountainous 107-mile leg that ended in Puerto de Navacerrada.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy tightened his grip on the Vuelta a España title, finishing second behind his rival Ezequiel Mosquera in the race’s 20th stage, a mountainous 107-mile leg that ended in Puerto de Navacerrada.
